criteria.accuracy: Correctly identifies the demonstrative nature of the source material
criteria.completeness: Covers all key aspects of the sample text's purpose and content
criteria.inference_handling: Appropriately avoids unsupported inferences about author/source

eval.feedback: The summary accurately captures the meta-instructional nature of the sample text and correctly identifies its demonstrative purpose. The structure is clear with a main summary section and bullet points highlighting key aspects. You appropriately avoided making unsupported inferences about authorship or source beyond what the text explicitly indicates. For full marks, the summary could have been slightly more concise while maintaining all key information.
eval.suggested_prompt: Generate a concise summary of this demonstration text, focusing specifically on its instructional purpose and meta-characteristics without adding any contextual inferences about its origin or authorship.
